---
title: "MOSAIC R packages"
description: |
  The various R packages produced by the MOSAIC team.
---

This is where we can provide links to the various packages.

* [`{mosaic}`](https://www.mosaic-web.org/mosaic/)
    - `{mosaicCore}`
    - `{mosaicData}`
* [`{ggformula}`](https://www.mosaic-web.org/ggformula/)
* [`{mosaicCalc}`](https://github.com/ProjectMOSAIC/mosaicCalc) -- 
Those following the progress of the USAFA modeling-based calculus course should
install from GitHub: `remotes::install_github("ProjectMOSAIC/mosaicCalc@beta")`
* [`{mosaicModel}`](https://www.mosaic-web.org/ggformula/) -- This package is in an indeterminate state while we figure out how to integrate with the many modeling packages introduced as part of the `{tidyverse}`.
